newsitem.title: UK: Saudi raises most crude prices to Europe in Oct.
newsitem.headline: Saudi raises most crude prices to Europe in Oct.

text.p: Saudi Arabia raised October term crude price formulas to European buyers for all grades except Arab Heavy, traders said.
Extra light Berri was raised cents to Dated Brent less 85 cts fob Ras Tanura.
Arab Light was raised 10 cents to Dated Brent less $1.70 fob Ras Tanura.
Arab Medium was raised 5 cents to Dated Brent less $2.65.
Arab Heavy was left unchanged at Dated Brent less $3.10
Saudi Aramco raised its October crude prices for term lifters in Asia by 10 cents for Medium and Heavy grades and left light grades unchanged, traders said.
This took Arab Medium up to 40 cents below the Oman/Dubai formula and Arab Heavy to Oman/Dubai -$1.10. Arab Light was unchanged at Oman/Dubai +55 cents and Berri Extra Light at Oman/Dubai +$1.40.
